name: Snowball fight (Mr. Kitkat)
description:
The cats Bjartur and Mjási are on a field trip when all of a sudden it begins to snow heavily! The decide to take the chance and have a snowball fight!

Defeat your friends in cat-snowball in this local versus game!

Controls: 

Player 1 (Mjási) uses WASD to move, F to jump and G to throw snowballs. 

Player 2 (Bjartur) uses the arrow keys to move, K to jump and L to throw snowballs.

Press down when in a pile of snow to pick up more snowballs.
